title: Bug 11306 - New class wizard launches simple project wizard
description: When there are no existing projects, the dialog prompts the user to create a new project, which is very handy.
OB: Upon selecting 'yes' in response to creating a new project, the resulting dialog displays the first page of the generic new project wizard instead of opening the Java Project wizard as expected in the Java Class wizard.
EB: When answering 'yes' to create a new project in the New Class wizard, the Java Class wizard should correctly open the Java Project wizard.
SR: 1. Launch the application and ensure there are no existing projects. 2. Trigger the New Class wizard. 3. Respond 'yes' when prompted to create a new project. 4. Observe that the resulting dialog opens the first page of the generic new project wizard instead of the expected Java Project wizard.
